data.message: Hi There, my page was hacked by my ex employ, i have given him the admin rights to advertise about the company, after he left the job he remove me from admin role, i need my page back , that person is spoiling my company name by posting bad things, please help to get my page back. thank you

replies.message: Hi there. If you think someone else has access to your account, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2ss4BOd. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure at: http://bit.ly/2ss3o9w. -Jon
its not a acount its a page!
this is my page it has been hacked , please help.
Good luck. Ive been waiting over a month.

Hi .Another month has passed. Is there seriously no answer yet? Over 4 weeks and my page is still gone. The hacker has more rights than me? Im yhe one paying for adverts. Boosting my business yet YOU cant assist me.  Im losing business every day. Not sure if it means anything to you... but this is my income. How can I esculate this problem. Your help center keeps on sending an automated reply and then closing my case without answers. Is there no one in facebook that can assist ?
I am having this exact issue and have been unable to get any assistance.

Facebook why can't someone actually help those of us that have issues?  If it's a page and a former employee has made themselves the only one with access, there is no way for us to "keep our account secure."
